root.name: Lineage: The Blood Pledge
root.description: Lineage: The Blood pledge is a MMORPG originating from Korea. It demonstrates a play style very similar to Diablo. Heavily based on PvP between Blood Pledges (Clans), which even involves a castle control system.Lineage has five different playable classes at this time; Knight, Mage, Elf, Dark Elf, and Royal.
